attributes.action: Put in place a Carbon Footprint Traffic Light guide on mainstream products sold.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the same way that we have a traffic light guidance for the nutritional value of food, I would like to see put in place one for the Carbon footprint of products. This would enable the consumer to have a choice as to which flowers to buy, which car, which peice of furniture, in turn this may encourage producers to lower their carbon foot print.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
